name: Gift Box
description:
Terrorists are planning to destroy the city by bomb attacks. Our recent intelligence report states that they are planting bombs in gift boxes! It is very much difficult to detect those bombs from a bulk amount of different gift boxes. But our detectives are very much brilliant to detect those gift boxes with bombs. And, it is your duty to throw away those Gift Boxes with bombs in them. 

Good luck Agent!

Instructions :
* Tap on normal gift boxes.
* Swipe away gift boxes containing bombs.
